# A list of standards and technologies used in Webical

== Introduction ==

The following standards and technologies are used by Webical

== Standards ==
  * [http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2445.txt iCalendar]
  * [http://www.section508.gov/ Section 508]
  * [http://www.webdav.org/ WebDav]
  * CalDav
  * [http://www.calconnect.org/ The Calendaring and Scheduling Consortium]

== Technologies ==

=== GUI ===
  * [http://wicket.apache.org Wicket]
  * [http://developer.yahoo.com/yui/ The YAHOO! Interface Library (YUI)]
=== iCalendar ===
  * [http://ical4j.sourceforge.net/ ical4j]
=== Business Logic ===
  * [http://www.springframework.org/ Spring framework]
=== Persistence ===
    * [http://www.hibernate.org/ Hibernate]
    * [http://www.mysql.com MySQL]
